text:
The TRACE command in the HTTP protocol does allow for security problems.

As described at http://www.whitehatsec.com/press_releases/WH-PR-20030120.txt

Sincce this already is reported at slashdot, I consider it a public problem
already and I am therefore reporting it here.
creator: u36674300@bedug.com

text:
This is not a bug in apache; it is a browser problem.  You should probably
read the entire thread on bugtraq:
http://marc.theaimsgroup.com/?t=104326484700001&r=1&w=2

There is a slight inconvenience caused by the fact that you can't <Limit TRACE>
in Apache, but there is no bug.

Thanks for using Apache.
creator: slive@apache.org
